item.description:
Come join me for the 10th Annual Rock n' Rib Fest for great food and entertainment on the beautiful and spacious grounds of Anheuser-Busch. Enjoy the best barbecue in New Hampshire with a variety of music and entertainment! New England’s premier family event – one weekend only on June 15, 16, and 17 at Anheuser-Busch in Merrimack, New Hampshire. All of the funds raised at the Rotary Rock’n Ribfest go to support area non-profit organizations, so come on out and enjoy helping others! What I found out last year is if we get there early , we can get parking right across the street from the brewery.We will meet at the entrance.

This is maybe the 5th year we've done this.  I decided to change to Friday night this year because I am not too thrilled with the music selection the rest of the weekend.  All the other bands, while good are local.  I hope that you can join me.

http://www.rotaryribfest.org

Music :

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/music/

Activities:

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/activities/

[b]2012 Ribbers:[/b]

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/activities/rib-vendors/

[b]If You Don’t Feel Like Ribs[/b]

http://www.rotaryribfest.org/activities/food-beverages/

[b]Cost:[/b]

$7; Children under 9 are free
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a balloon attached to my chair.
item.name: 10th annual Rock'N Rib Fest, Anheuser-Busch
